thread.section_title: McElhinneys Department Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of McElhinneys Department Store | mcelhinneys.com
thread.title: Rosemary
thread.title_full: McElhinneys Department Store reviewed by Rosemary

author: Rosemary
title: Rosemary
text: First time shopping with McElhinneys ,I purchased online as I am at other end of country , dress was delivered the following day ,unfortunately it was not suitable as I am shopping for a wedding abroad & material was too heavy so I had to arrange return. This was a very easy procedure & the dress was collected by a courier at no charge. Very happy with the whole experience & I would shop online with this store again.
